sk.tsystems.forum.entity

Class ProfilePicture

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.entity.common.CommonEntity
      • sk.tsystems.forum.entity.ProfilePicture

  • @Entity
public class ProfilePicture
extends CommonEntity
    Entity for ProfilePicture containing Byte[] (byte array) representation for small and big picture in User user's profile. Allows get picture, set picture or change size of the picture
    Author:
    J3DT
